certificates.title: Certificate Applications
certificates.description: Choose the type of certificate you need and complete the online application form. Our streamlined process makes it easy to apply for government certificates.

birth.title: Birth Certificate
birth.description: Apply for a birth certificate for newborns or children
points: Required documents: Hospital certificate, ID proof

death.title: Death Certificate
death.description: Apply for a death certificate for deceased persons
points: Required documents: Medical certificate, ID proof

marriage.title: Marriage Certificate
marriage.description: Apply for a marriage certificate for newlyweds
points: Required documents: Wedding photos, ID proof

landRecord8A.title: 8A Land Record Digital Signature
landRecord8A.description: Apply for 8A land record with digital signature

noOutstandingDebts.title: Certificate of No Outstanding Debts
noOutstandingDebts.description: Apply for certificate of no outstanding debts

digitalSigned712.title: Digitally Signed 7/12
digitalSigned712.description: Apply for digitally signed 7/12 land record

fillForm.title: Fill Application Form
fillForm.description: Complete the online form with all required information

uploadDocs.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocs.description: Upload supporting documents using our secure file upload

submitTrack.title: Submit & Track
submitTrack.description: Submit your application and track its progress online

notes: ‚Ä¢ All fields marked with * are mandatory
‚Ä¢ Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOC, DOCX
‚Ä¢ Applications are processed within 7-10 working days
